00115                 static double get_U( G4String cont ){
00116                         double val = G4UnitDefinition::GetValueOf(cont);
00117                         if (!val){
00118                                 std::cout<<"WARNING: value of unit ("<<cont<<") is 0!!! will set it to 1!!!"<<std::endl;
00119                                 val = 1;
00120                         }
00121                         return val;
00122                 }

00136                 static G4bool ConvertToBool(G4String st)
00137                 {
00138                         st.toUpper();
00139                         G4bool vl = false;
00140                         if( st=="Y" || st=="YES" || st=="1" || st=="T" || st=="TRUE" )
00141                         { vl = true; }
00142                         return vl;
00143                 }
